title: Government Overreach? We Have a Book for That! | Guest: Jeff Brown | 4/7/20
description:
Glenn’s new book, “Arguing with Socialists,” is available TODAY, and it couldn’t have come at a better time. Washington state is bringing on the socialist wish list! And China is offering masks in return for a 5G monopoly. Glenn breaks down why the media hates hydroxychloroquine. Technology expert Jeff Brown debunks the conspiracy theory that 5G caused the coronavirus pandemic. And Hillsborough County Sheriff Chad Chronister discusses the reopened case of "Tiger King’s" Carole Baskin’s disappeared husband, Don Lewis. In today’s COVID-19 update, grocery stores may not be safe, and can the virus hide in our cells? #MeToo activist Alyssa Milano “explains” her double standard on the sexual assault allegations against Joe Biden.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
